description: The workaround that is detailed to make FlatDHCP work on only one interface does not work because ifconfig overwrites the existing address on the bridge instead of adding a new one.  The ifconfig command should be converted to an ip addr add.
title: FlatDHCP workarounds don't work because linux_net uses ifconfig

comments.content: The workaround that is detailed to make FlatDHCP work on only one interface does not work because ifconfig overwrites the existing address on the bridge instead of adding a new one.  The ifconfig command should be converted to an ip addr add.
